name: A.O.D Conspirator
text:
1 "A.O.D" Tuner monster + 1 or more non-Tuner monster(s)
If this card is Synchro Summoned: banish 3 "A.O.D" cards from your GY, and if you do; you can add 1 "A.O.D" card or "Allure of Darkness" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "A.O.D Conspirator" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): banish 3 cards from the bottom of your Deck and target 1 monster card on the field or in the GY; banish that target.
